attributes.background: I Believe that the UK should be allowed to hold fire arms to use at ranges or hunting I believe that this is a human right, so why should the good innocent people have to give this right up due to a small few. the way the UK government could do this is by doing background checks

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. It is not clear what action you would like the UK Government and Parliament to take. You could start a petition calling for a specific change in current legislation, or for new legislation relating to gun ownership.

You can find out more about current firearms licensing law here: https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/518193/Guidance_on_Firearms_Licensing_Law_April_2016_v20.pdf
